titleStmt.title: Unto the right honourable the lords of His Majesties Privie Conncil [sic], the petition of Patrick Johnstoun, late bailie in Edinburgh, Alexander Campbel, Alexander Clerk, and Alexander Mackgill, merchants in Edinburgh, David Waike, and Ralph Spurri Englishmen.
titleStmt.author: Johnstoun, Patrick.
Campbel, Alexander.
Clerk, Alexander.
Mackgill, Alexander.
Waike, David.
Spurri, Ralph.
